name: Final Major Project - Naval Game Environment (Jude)
name_original: Final Major Project - Naval Game Environment (Jude)
description:
(Click anywhere on the game screen for camera to work)

For my final major project, I've decided to go back to a theme that I originally started this course with, that theme involved the navy. Having a huge passion for the navy my first ever project was a pong remake with a naval theme thrown on it, and for my final project of the course, I wanted to create a 3D game environment that used the naval theme.

Brief synopsis of the story:
The world is on the brink of war,  and all aspects of the military are preparing for orders to mobilize around the world. Set within a naval base packed with several naval vessels, a strikeforce of five warships is being sent out into the ocean to patrol its territorial waters.

Plot twist:
Radar has detected an enemy fleet heading towards the naval base with orders potentially to destroy the entire base,  the strikeforce's new task is to find and locate the enemy fleet before it gets to the naval base and completes its objective. 

Controls: (Flying Camera to tour)
W - Forward
A - Left
S - Backwards
D - Right
Mouse - Viewing
